author: Deepa Seetharaman
title: Facebook to Streamline Privacy Settings
text:
Facebook Inc., facing a firestorm over how it handles personal information, says it will make it simpler for users to examine and change some of the data Facebook tracks about them.

The tweaks announced Wednesday, which will roll out in the coming weeks, include a new, central hub in the Facebook app settings that contains existing tools for users to review and, if desired, delete traces of their Facebook activity such as past posts and search terms.
